title: Generate Daily Drilling Report
description: A rig clerk compiles the daily drilling report for management, summarizing the last 24 hours of operations.

tasks.description: Gather all operational data from the last 24 hours, including depth drilled, activities performed, and materials used.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary data points for the report are collected from various rig systems.

tasks.description: Populate the standard daily drilling report template with the collected data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report template is correctly filled out.

tasks.description: Submit the completed report for approval by the company man and distribute it to the project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is approved and emailed to the distribution list.
